meanings.definition: To become greater in size, amount, or degree.
meanings.sent1: The cake greatened in the oven as it baked.
meanings.sent2: The tree greatened over the years, reaching towards the sky.
meanings.sent3: The balloon greatened so much that it popped with a loud bang!
meanings.sent4: Her excitement greatened like a balloon filling with air.
meanings.sent5: The storm clouds greatened, casting a shadow over the town.

meanings.definition: To make greater in size, amount, or degree.
meanings.sent1: She greatened her savings by working extra hours.
meanings.sent2: The artist greatened the details in his painting to make it more realistic.
meanings.sent3: The chef greatened the flavor of the soup by adding more spices.
meanings.sent4: His kindness greatened the warmth in the room.
meanings.sent5: The teacher greatened the challenge of the assignment to help students grow.
